post.text:
Donald Trump says he'll create a new test for immigrants.

It's a test he'd fail.

comment.author: Ian
comment.text: Just read that Hillary will be taking weekends of for the rest of her campaign. You can't handle running for president while cheating ......what makes her think she can handle the presidency. I look forward to a first woman president, just not this unhealthy hag
